chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
The display has a decent scratch in the main visual area, which I don't consider excellent condition.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Christian,

You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: 

Before you prepare your return, please read the instructions below:
1. Here is a link with step-by-step guidance on how to return an item: <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product.
3. Remove any existing protection film or wrap.
4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below:

How to package your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product placed inside so it won't move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside in case the original one is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready to be shipped! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile,

the customer is not satisfied with the esthetic and requested a refund.
Thank you.

Regards,
Mario from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We await the arrival of the parcel. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
AS
